reviews.author: Katlyn Cummings
reviews.review: They have been a very communicative and professional group by owning up to some hiccups upon move-in, and taking responsibility by hiring landscapers to manage the grounds around the units. Definitely an ethical business to work with.

reviews.author: Paige Nausha
reviews.review: We rented from Evergreen Properties NW for approximately 5 years. We were in the unit for 6 years, but it was managed by another company for the first year or so. We are VERY glad that Evergreen Properties NW took over because from then on,

ownerResponse.text:
Paige,

Thank you for the review!  It was wonderful having you both as tenants and would welcome you back anytime!

reviews.author: Kayleigh Mattoon
reviews.review: While working with Casey was enjoyable and he was attentive to our property needs, I cannot give 5 stars. Casey works hard, however, unfortunately, he has abysmal staff who do not communicate with the tenant or with Casey appropriately.

reviews.author: RYAN HIMMEL
reviews.review: Just took over a lease and the whole process was super easy. This is by far the most ethical property management company in the area. Casey specifically is very helpful and responds very quickly with any questions that you may have .

ownerResponse.text: Hi, Ryan, Thank you for the kind review.  We are happy to have you as a tenant!

reviews.author: Bryant Nichols
reviews.review: This was my experience with Casey and the group which was awful to say the least.

ownerResponse.text: Oh, Bryant. This review does not surprise me.    Im sorry you feel this way. However, You and your perpetually bitter girlfriend were quite difficult most of time. (Tenants we strive to avoid if I had to be completely honest)  I personally  More

reviews.author: Zack Elan
reviews.review:
incompetent and inconsiderate - they will waste your time.

I made an appointment to view one of their available rentals. told the guy I'd

ownerResponse.text:
Zack,

We are sorry that this happened.  Our units are first come first serve and we accepted an application an hour before your viewing appointment.  Again, we are sorry about this.

reviews.author: Savannah Hoffman
reviews.review: Evergreen Properties has been nothing but helpful and kind towards me as a new tenant. They are incredibly easy to get ahold of and care greatly about any of the needs and concerns I have. They are the best property management group I have rented from in Bellingham!

reviews.author: CALEB LEE
reviews.review: Most helpful rental agency in Bellingham. Being a college town, renting can be stressful here at times. Casey and Rebecca at evergreen have made our renting experience as easy as possible. The women in the office have always been helpful

reviews.author: Cory Cavness
reviews.review:
After working with several mangment companies over the years, Evergreen Properties NW was wonderful to rent from.
They are easily available to get ahold of and fulfill maintenance requests very

reviews.author: Emily Cain
reviews.review: Evergreen Properties NW is an excellent property management group. They really care about the needs and concerns of their renters and are so quick to take care of problems that you are having. Within one day of putting in a maintenance request they were here fixing our shower, absolutely the best people to rent from.

reviews.author: Kayce Kutch
reviews.review: I rented this space sight unseen when I moved to Bellingham from out of state. Ive lived here for almost 3 years and it has been absolutely wonderful. My lease is up at the end of the month and I would stay if I wasnt moving into a house! Thank you for an easy 3 years.

ownerResponse.text:
Kayce,

It has been a pleasure having you as a tenant.  Thank you for the kind review!

reviews.author: sl vs
reviews.review: As far as property managers in Bellingham go, these folks are a giant leap ahead of the rest. As a newer company, sometimes they might get a little busy and overwhelmed, especially as they adjust to new growth, more tenants, and more

reviews.author: Kenny Roman
reviews.review:
Awesome managent company!

Been renting from these guys for about 9 months now and they have been on the

reviews.author: Andre Merritt
reviews.review: Awesome place to live. The staff is very helpful and respond to all needs expediantly. Would definitely rent from their properties again!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you, Andre!  We are glad to hear you had a good experience with us.  Casey Trosin, Managing Broker
Dan, I believe you have the wrong company.  Please call Casey if you have a concern with our marketing tactics.  We are a fair and transparent with all of our advertising.

Monica,
Unfortunately, when tenants leave their units in a less than desirable  condition, there are consequences.  We always try to be fair with everyone in regard to security deposits.  Please call Casey if you have additional concerns. 360-594-4229
